articles.title: Canada’s oil patch rattled by Trump's tariff plan - BBC.com
articles.description: The proposed tariffs, if applied to oil and gas, could hammer Canada's economy and hike prices at the pump for Americans, analysts say.
articles.content:
In Canadas oil-rich province of Alberta, there is a deep sense of unease over President-elect Donald Trump's threat to impose a 25% tariff on Canadian goods.
Canadian politicians and energy experts … [+5173 chars]
